definition[0]: if a letter or symbol stands for something, it represents a word or idea, especially as a short form
definition[1]: to support a particular set of ideas, values, or principles
example[1]: It’s hard to tell what the party stands for these days.
definition[2]: to not allow something to continue to happen or someone to do something
example[2]: She’s been lying about me, and I won’t stand for it.
